segments.text: Seat 30B is right here , sir . You may take your seat . I'll put your bag in the above compartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , miss . Will dinner be served on the plane ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . I'll bring you a menu shortly after we take off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be nice . Could you also get me a pillow and a blanket , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will this flight last ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is a six-hour flight with an-hour layover in Los Angles .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . I'll have plenty of time to nap on the plane .
segments.speaker: S2
